recommendation: Create and rehearse a documented incident response plan.
Contain threats immediately using playbooks and escalation procedures.

csf_subcategory_name: Response plans are improved following lessons learned
recommendation: Conduct post-mortems and update incident response playbooks.

csf_subcategory_name: Legal and regulatory requirements are managed
recommendation: Ensure legal counsel reviews incident processes and compliance.

Test backups and rehearse system restoration procedures.
Document findings from incidents and integrate them into recovery plans.

recommendation: Practice recovery exercises to reveal gaps and speed restoration.
